EmailTemplate.subject: Are you damaging customer ATM experiences with out-of-date software?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Are your ATMs glitching? Is the UI slow and clunky? Are availability levels falling? If so, you may have missed an important software update. Staying current with the latest software updates is crucial to keeping your ATM network running smoothly and delivering the exceptional experience your customers expect. These updates include important patches to ensure no bugs or glitches occur that can slow down transactions or even take the ATM offline. And that’s before we consider the security and compliance implications of out-of-date software, which fraudsters are always looking to exploit.
